mapper.select: SELECT e.*, u.phone AS userTelephone, es.workStatus, es.firmware_version, es.last_active_at FROM tb_equipment e LEFT JOIN tb_equipmentstatus es ON es.equipment_id = e.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_share us ON us.equipment_id = e.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON u.user_id = us.share_user_id WHERE us.status = 0

select *,s.workStatus,s.temperature as current_temp,o.appointment_temperature,h.status from tb_equipment t LEFT JOIN tb_equipmentstatus s ON t.equipment_id = s.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_equipment_appointment o on t.equipment_id = o.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_share h ON t.equipment_id = h.equipment_id where t.equipment_id in ( select equipment_id from tb_user_share where h.share_user_id = #{userId} ) GROUP BY t.equipment_id

select *,s.workStatus,s.temperature as current_temp, s.volume, s.backlight,s.app_enabled,o.appointment_temperature, g.status AS guaranteeStatus,ed.`period` from tb_equipment t LEFT JOIN tb_equipmentstatus s ON t.equipment_id = s.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_guarantee g ON g.equipment_id = t.equipment_id LEFT JOIN tb_equipment_appointment o on t.equipment_id = o.equipment_id left join equipment_datatype ed on t.type=ed.type where t.equipment_id = #{equipment_id} group by t.equipment_id
select *,tes.temperature as current_temp from tb_equipment te left join tb_equipmentstatus tes on te.equipment_id=tes.equipment_id where equipmentNum = #{equipmentNum}
mapper.update: update tb_equipment_appointment SET user_id = #{user_id}, effluent_speed = #{effluent_speed},time = #{time}, children_status = #{children_status},appointment_temperature = #{appointment_temperature},effluent_type = #{effluent_type}, effluent_amount = #{effluent_amount},effluent_time = #{effluent_time}, effluent_way = #{effluent_way},updated_at=NOW() where equipment_id = #{equipment_id}

UPDATE tb_equipment INNER JOIN tb_equipmentstatus ON tb_equipmentstatus.equipment_id = tb_equipment.equipment_id SET tb_equipment.type = #{type}, tb_equipmentstatus.voicebroadcast = #{voicebroadcast}, tb_equipmentstatus.volume = #{volume}, tb_equipmentstatus.backlight = #{backlight}, tb_equipmentstatus.ip = #{ip}, tb_equipmentstatus.port = #{port}, tb_equipmentstatus.temperature = #{current_temp}, tb_equipment.firm_version=#{firm_version}, tb_equipmentstatus.effluent_way=#{effluent_way}, tb_equipmentstatus.effluent_type=#{effluent_type}, tb_equipmentstatus.app_enabled=#{app_enabled}, tb_equipmentstatus.m_use_water=#{m_use_water}, tb_equipmentstatus.m_jie_water=#{m_jie_water}, tb_equipmentstatus.province=#{province}, tb_equipmentstatus.city=#{city}, tb_equipmentstatus.settemperature=#{settemperature}, tb_equipmentstatus.workStatus=#{workStatus}, tb_equipmentstatus.started=#{started}, tb_equipmentstatus.sur_water=#{sur_water}, tb_equipmentstatus.sur_time=#{sur_time}, tb_equipmentstatus.effluent_type2=#{effluent_type2}, tb_equipmentstatus.current_flow_grade=#{current_flow_grade}, tb_equipmentstatus.a_send_time=#{a_send_time}, tb_equipmentstatus.m_send_time=#{m_send_time}, tb_equipmentstatus.rw_send_time=#{rw_send_time}, tb_equipmentstatus.cw_send_time=#{cw_send_time}, tb_equipmentstatus.scyc_send_time=#{scyc_send_time} WHERE tb_equipment.equipment_id = #{equipment_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_customerservice WHERE equipment_id = #{equipment_id} and status!=2 limit 1

SELECT ( CASE WHEN (tes.workStatus IS NULL) THEN '4' ELSE tes.workStatus END ) AS workStatus, te.*,tu.*,tes.* FROM tb_equipment te LEFT JOIN `tb_equipmentstatus` tes ON tes.`equipment_id` = te.`equipment_id` left join tb_user_share tus on tus.equipment_id=te.`equipment_id` and tus.status=0 LEFT JOIN `tb_user` tu ON tus.`share_user_id` = tu.`user_id` WHERE 1 = 1
and te.equipmentNum like concat('%',#{equipmentNum},'%')
and tu.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and te.type = #{type}
and date(te.binded_at) = date(#{binded_at_a,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
group by te.equipment_id

and province=#{province}
